message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something a little more beneficial to me.  It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats away at it!
I'll give a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Okay Alice, let's be realistic.  We're running out of time and this is a fair split before inflation eats away at it any further.
I'll meet you halfway between our last offers, but I'm not going below this
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're down to the wire.  Let's just split it evenly and get out of here before we're both left with nothing!
